mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture( category, lecture_name, id, room_num, start_date, end_date, lecture_time, lecture_day lecture_price ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{lectureName}, #{id}, #{roomNum}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{lectureTime}, #{lectureDay}, #{lecturePrice} )
mapper.select: SELECT lecture_no lectureNo, lecture_name lectureName, id, room_num roomNum, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, lecture_time lectureTime, lecture_day lectureDay, lecture_price lecturePrice, update_date updateDate, create_date createDate FROM lecture;

SELECT (SELECT c.category FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN category c ON l.category_no = c.category_no WHERE l.lecture_no = ${lectureNo}) category, lecture_name lectureName, (SELECT DISTINCT t.name FROM lecture l LEFT JOIN teacher t ON l.id = t.id WHERE l.id = (SELECT DISTINCT m.id FROM member m LEFT JOIN lecture l ON m.id = l.id WHERE l.lecture_no = ${lectureNo})) name, room_num roomNum, start_date startDate, end_date endDate, lecture_time lectureTime, lecture_day lectureDay, lecture_price lecturePrice FROM lecture WHERE lecture_no = ${lectureNo};
